p: Seven EOs were used in this study, viz., oregano ( Origanum vulgare), thyme ( Thymus vulgaris), lemongrass ( Cymbopogon citratus), tea tree ( Melaleuca alternifolia), mentha ( Mentha piperita), lavender ( Lavendula anguestifolia) and chamomile ( Matricaria recutita). The pharmaceutical grade EOs were kindly provided as a gift from the Department of Food Science and Technology, Nebraska University, Lincoln, NE, USA. We determined the composition of oregano and thyme EOs by GC-MS analysis at the Department of Pharmacognosy, Faculty of Pharmacy, Cairo University, as detailed in Section 4.8. Pure thymol was purchased from Sigma Aldrich, St. Louis, MO, USA.
